revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.2.7.1)
revision.text: {{WPMILHIST|class=C|B1=n|B2=y|B3=y|B4=y|B5=y|Weaponry=yes}} {{WikiProject Firearms|class=C|B1=n|B2=y|B3=y|B4=y|B5=y}} == Missing source == "A version of the Caracal adapted to high velocity ammunition like the 4.6x30mm used in the Heckler & Koch MP7 and the 5.7x28mm used in the FN P90 and the FN Five Seven would be under development." Source? — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/79.252.179.183|79.252.179.183]] ([[User talk:79.252.179.183|talk]]) 17:06, 26 May 2011 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:8|one external link|8 external links}} on [[Caracal pistol]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=749554846 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20081203064854/http://caracal-arms.info:80/caracal-pistol/caracal-pistol.html to http://caracal-arms.info/caracal-pistol/caracal-pistol.html *Added {{tlx|dead link}} tag to http://www.tanfoglio.it/uploads/docs/caracalprezzipubblico.pdf *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20131007002743/http://www.ameinfo.com/caracal-international-unveils-generation-models-popular-353251 to http://www.ameinfo.com/caracal-international-unveils-generation-models-popular-353251 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20081203030651/http://www.caracal.ae:80/Caracal_Brochure.pdf to http://www.caracal.ae/Caracal_Brochure.pdf *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20131227115856/http://www.caracal.ae:80/new/downloads/User_Manual.pdf to http://www.caracal.ae/new/downloads/User_Manual.pdf *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20120425151522/http://www.caracalforum.com/viewtopic.php?f=12&t=26 to http://www.caracalforum.com/viewtopic.php?f=12&t=26 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20131008021850/http://www.caracal.ae:80/new/Caracal%20C%20-%20Update%20Recall%20Notice%20-Sep%2013.pdf to http://www.caracal.ae/new/Caracal%20C%20-%20Update%20Recall%20Notice%20-Sep%2013.pdf *Added archive http://www.webcitation.org/6JxyuxKqy?url=http://www.scribd.com/doc/96608601/Individual-weapons-combat-pistols to http://www.asianmilitaryreview.com/CurrentIssue/dl.php?filename=200901021211061.pdf *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20081203064854/http://caracal-arms.info:80/caracal-pistol/caracal-pistol.html to http://caracal-arms.info/caracal-pistol/caracal-pistol.html When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 22:58, 14 November 2016 (UTC)
